flavorText: Rowan and Will exchanged a baffled glance. Could the stag in the vision lead them to their father?

foreignData.flavorText: Rowan und Will tauschten überraschte Blicke. Konnte der Hirsch in der Vision sie zu ihrem Vater führen?
foreignData.name: Unerklärliche Vision
foreignData.text:
Ziehe drei Karten.
Adamant — Falls drei oder mehr blaue Mana ausgegeben wurden, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, wende Hellsicht 3 an.

foreignData.flavorText: Rowan y Will intercambiaron una mirada de desconcierto. ¿Acaso el ciervo de la visión iba a conducirlos ante su padre?
foreignData.name: Visión inexplicable
foreignData.text:
Roba tres cartas.
Tesón — Si se usaron al menos tres manás azules para lanzar este hechizo, adivina 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Rowan et Will échangèrent un regard perplexe. Le cerf de leur vision pouvait-il les conduire à leur père ?
foreignData.name: Vision inexpliquée
foreignData.text:
Piochez trois cartes.
Inflexible — Si au moins trois manas bleus ont été dépensés pour lancer ce sort, regard 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Rowan e Will si guardarono perplessi. Il cervo nella visione poteva condurli da loro padre?
foreignData.name: Visione Inspiegabile
foreignData.text:
Pesca tre carte.
Adamantino — Se sono stati spesi almeno tre mana blu per lanciare questa magia, profetizza 3.

foreignData.flavorText: ローアンとウィルは当惑して顔を見合わせた。幻視の中の鹿が父親の居場所を知っているということだろうか？
foreignData.name: 不可解な幻視
foreignData.text:
カードを３枚引く。
一徹 ― この呪文を唱えるために青マナが３点以上支払われていたなら、占術３を行う。

foreignData.flavorText: 로완과 윌은 당황해서 서로를 마주보았다. 과연 환상에서 나타난 수사슴이 그들을 아버지에게로 인도해 줄 수 있을까?
foreignData.name: 설명되지 않은 환상
foreignData.text:
카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
단호 — 이 주문을 발동하는 데 적어도 청색 마나 세 개가 지불되었다면, 점술 3을 한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Rowan e Will trocaram um olhar perplexo. Será que o cervo na visão poderia levar ao pai deles?
foreignData.name: Visão Inexplicável
foreignData.text:
Compre três cards.
Obstinação — Se ao menos três manas azuis tiverem sido gastos para conjurar esta mágica, use vidência 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Рован и Уилл обменялись недоуменными взглядами. Этот олень из видения должен привести их к отцу?
foreignData.name: Необъясненное Видение
foreignData.text:
Возьмите три карты.
Твердость — Если на разыгрывание этого заклинания было потрачено три или больше синей маны, предскажите 3.

foreignData.flavorText: 萝婉和威尔面面相觑：景象中的雄鹿是否能帮助他们找到父王下落？
foreignData.name: 难解视像
foreignData.text:
抓三张牌。
固色～如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点蓝色法术力，则占卜3。

foreignData.flavorText: 蘿婉和威爾面面相覷：景象中的雄鹿是否能幫助他們找到父王下落？
foreignData.name: 難解視像
foreignData.text:
抽三張牌。
固色～如果施放此咒語時支付過至少三點藍色魔法力，則占卜3。

name: Unexplained Vision
originalText:
Draw three cards.
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.

rulings.text: If an instant or sorcery spell has an adamant ability, you perform the spell's instructions in order. You don't perform the adamant instruction before the spell resolves or before any other effects printed above it.

If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

text:
Draw three cards.
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.
